      • routeBetweenHosts

        public List<Host> routeBetweenHosts(Host m1,
                           Host m2)
                             throws Exception
        Compute the route between two hosts. The max TTL has been set to 64.
        Parameters:
        m1 - the source host
        m2 - the destination host
        Returns:
        the list of hosts that constitute the route
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception

      • sendAPacketFromAHostToAnotherSucceed

        public boolean sendAPacketFromAHostToAnotherSucceed(IPAddress ipFrom,
                                           int sourcePort,
                                           IPAddress ipTo,
                                           int destinationPort,
                                           FirewallRule.Protocol protocol)
                                             throws Exception
        Send a packet from a host to another and see if it is blocked or not.
        Parameters:
        ipFrom - IP of the sender
        sourcePort - port of the sender
        ipTo - IP of the receiver
        destinationPort - port of the receiver
        protocol - protocol used
        Returns:
        true if this packet arrives.
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception

                          IPAddress ipFrom,
                          IPAddress maskFrom,

                          IPAddress maskTo,
                          int destinationPort,
                          FirewallRule.Protocol protocol)
                            throws Exception
        Send a packet on a route and see if it is blocked or not.
        Parameters:
        route - the route of the packet
        ipFrom - the ip from
        maskFrom - the mask from
        sourcePort - the source port
        ipTo - IP of the receiver
        maskTo - the mask to
        destinationPort - port of the receiver
        protocol - protocol used
        Returns:
        true if this packet arrives.
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception

      • sendAPacketOnARouteFromInternet

        public boolean sendAPacketOnARouteFromInternet(List<Host> route,
                                      IPAddress ipAddress,
                                      int portNumber,
                                      FirewallRule.Protocol protocol)
                                        throws Exception
        Send a packet on a route from internet.
        Parameters:
        route - the route followed by the packet
        ipAddress - the destination ip address
        portNumber - the destination port
        protocol - the proto used
        Returns:
        true if the packet can pass the route if it comes from internet
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception
